title: Textured Whimsy
description: Un style d'illustration charmant qui imite les médias secs traditionnels comme les crayons de couleur, les crayons de cire et la gouache sur du papier rugueux. Il présente des perspectives naïves, des formes organiques et une texture granuleuse très tactile qui évoque une atmosphère chaleureuse de livre de contes.
prompt: A high-quality, hand-drawn style illustration of {{subject}} rendered with a charming, naive aesthetic reminiscent of contemporary children's books and editorial art. The artistic technique mimics a blend of dry gouache, wax crayons, and colored pencils applied vigorously to heavy-grain paper, resulting in a rich, tactile surface full of scratchy strokes, stippling, and visible paper texture. The forms are organic and slightly flattened, rejecting strict realism in favor of a playful, whimsical interpretation of the {{subject}}. The color palette utilizes a dominant wash of {{primary_color}} to establish the mood, with vibrant details highlighted in {{accent_color}} to create visual interest and contrast. The lighting is soft, diffuse, and illustrative, avoiding harsh photorealistic shadows to maintain a flat, graphical look. The edges of the subject are rough and imperfect, characteristic of manual drawing tools. The image is set against a solid {{background_color}} background, ensuring high contrast for the textured edges and easy separation of the subject from the negative space. The atmosphere is warm, creative, and inviting, capturing a sense of handcrafted authenticity.
background_prompt: A detailed background scene depicting a cozy, creative environment or textured pattern without any central subject. The style mimics dry gouache and colored pencil on grainy paper, featuring elements like pinned art prints, potted plants, or abstract organic shapes. The colors are warm and earthy, utilizing shades of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} to create a cluttered but harmonious backdrop. The texture is heavy and scratchy, with visible stroke marks and a matte finish, all composed on a {{background_color}} canvas to frame the scene.
description_en: A charming illustration style that mimics traditional dry media like colored pencils, wax crayons, and gouache on rough paper. It features naive perspectives, organic shapes, and a highly tactile, grainy texture that evokes a cozy, storybook atmosphere.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration charmant qui imite les médias secs traditionnels comme les crayons de couleur, les crayons de cire et la gouache sur du papier rugueux. Il présente des perspectives naïves, des formes organiques et une texture granuleuse très tactile qui évoque une atmosphère chaleureuse de livre de contes.

title: Doodle Pop
description: Un style d'illustration ludique dessiné à la main, caractérisé par des contours noirs audacieux et une palette de couleurs limitée à fort contraste. Il présente des gribouillages environnementaux énergiques, des motifs rayés abstraits et des éléments manuscrits entourant le sujet pour créer une atmosphère dynamique de brainstorming.
prompt: A whimsical, high-quality hand-drawn illustration of {{subject}}, executed in a charming doodle art style. The visual aesthetic mimics a creative brainstorming sketch using bold, slightly wobbly black ink lines that vary in weight, suggesting a thick marker pen. The rendering is strictly flat 2D with no realistic shading or gradients, relying on high-contrast blocks of color. The palette is limited and punchy, featuring {{primary_color}} as the dominant tone for the main elements, and {{accent_color}} for vibrant pops of interest on highlights or accessories. Surrounding the {{subject}} is an energetic burst of abstract graphic elements: striped geometric shapes, stylized organic leaves, floating squiggles, exclamation marks, dots, speech bubbles, and motion lines. The texture suggests a matte, slightly grainy paper surface. The image is composited on a clean {{background_color}} surface to ensure distinct separation and high contrast. The overall mood is enthusiastic, innovative, and friendly. Technical attributes: flat vector style, crisp lines, commercial illustration quality, unshaded, graphic design aesthetic, clean composition, artistic sketch.
background_prompt: A creative background pattern of hand-drawn abstract elements and doodle motifs arranged to frame a central empty space. The composition includes bold black-outlined geometric shapes with diagonal stripes, scattered squiggles, dots, and stylized organic forms like leaves or petals. The color scheme uses flat fills of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} against a clean {{background_color}} background. The style is sketchy and organic, resembling a marker drawing on paper, with a subtle grain texture and no depth of field.
description_en: A playful, hand-drawn illustration style characterized by bold black ink outlines and a limited, high-contrast color palette. It features energetic environmental doodles, abstract striped patterns, and handwritten elements surrounding the subject to create a dynamic, brainstorming atmosphere.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration ludique dessiné à la main, caractérisé par des contours noirs audacieux et une palette de couleurs limitée à fort contraste. Il présente des gribouillages environnementaux énergiques, des motifs rayés abstraits et des éléments manuscrits entourant le sujet pour créer une atmosphère dynamique de brainstorming.

title: Geometric Vector
description: Un style d'illustration vectorielle moderne et plat, caractérisé par des formes géométriques épurées, des proportions exagérées et des couleurs unies vives. Il crée une esthétique technologique d'entreprise joyeuse avec un art sans contours et un ombrage minimal à bords nets.
prompt: A high-quality, modern flat vector illustration of {{subject}}, executed in a distinct 'Corporate Memphis' or tech-editorial aesthetic. The artwork is constructed entirely from clean, solid geometric shapes with fluid curves and sharp angles, completely devoid of black outlines or strokes. The rendering style is strictly 2D flat design, utilizing a vibrant and high-contrast color palette dominated by {{primary_color}}, with playful and striking details in {{accent_color}}. Shading is minimal and stylized, using only hard-edged blocks of slightly darker solid colors to indicate depth and separation of layers, creating a paper-cutout feel without any gradients, noise, or texture. The surface finish is perfectly smooth, matte, and digital, mimicking the precision of vector software like Adobe Illustrator. Proportions are stylized and slightly exaggerated to enhance the friendly and approachable mood. The composition is bold and graphic, set against a solid {{background_color}} background to ensure crisp edge definition and easy background removal. The lighting implies a soft, global illumination that eliminates harsh cast shadows, maintaining a cheerful and optimistic atmosphere typical of modern UI/UX illustrations. reinforcement tags: flat design, vector art, lineless, minimal, trending on Dribbble, Behance, high saturation, sharp focus, 8k, commercial art, editorial illustration, crisp edges, vivid colors, geometric abstraction.
description_en: A modern, flat vector illustration style characterized by clean geometric shapes, exaggerated proportions, and vibrant solid colors. It creates a cheerful, corporate-tech aesthetic with lineless art and minimal, hard-edged shading.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration vectorielle moderne et plat, caractérisé par des formes géométriques épurées, des proportions exagérées et des couleurs unies vives. Il crée une esthétique technologique d'entreprise joyeuse avec un art sans contours et un ombrage minimal à bords nets.
background_prompt: A seamless abstract background pattern composed of floating geometric shapes and playful vector elements. The scene features scattered circles, squiggles, triangles, and organic blobs rendered in flat {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} tones. The design is completely lineless with a smooth matte finish, set against a clean {{background_color}} surface. The arrangement is balanced and decorative, creating a modern tech-editorial atmosphere without any central subject, perfect for use as a backdrop or graphical overlay.

title: Soft Clay
description: Un style de rendu 3D minimaliste caractérisé par des textures lisses et mates rappelant le plastique doux ou l'argile raffinée. Il utilise des palettes pastel, un éclairage de studio diffus et une géométrie arrondie pour créer une esthétique propre, tactile et réconfortante.
prompt: A high-fidelity 3D rendering of {{subject}} executed in a charming, minimalistic claymorphism style. The subject is modeled with smooth, rounded edges and a pristine matte finish that mimics soft-touch plastic, hardened fondant, or refined clay. The surface texture is uniform and velvety, absorbing light gently without harsh specular highlights. The color scheme features {{primary_color}} as the dominant tone for the main structure, accented by {{accent_color}} for smaller details or text elements to create a pleasing visual balance. The lighting is composed of a soft, diffuse studio setup with large area lights, generating gentle, wrap-around illumination and soft, feathered shadows that ground the object. The scene is set against a clean, seamless {{background_color}} background, ensuring a smooth transition between the subject and the environment. The rendering style emulates high-end motion graphics software like Cinema 4D with Octane Render or Blender Cycles, prioritizing a clean, toy-like aesthetic with physically based rendering (PBR) materials that feel synthetic yet incredibly tactile and satisfying. The composition is uncluttered, focusing entirely on the purity of form and color interaction.
background_prompt: A minimal, seamless 3D studio environment featuring a smooth infinite backdrop in {{background_color}}. The space is illuminated by soft, diffuse global illumination that creates gentle gradients across the curved surface. Subtle, abstract geometric primitives (spheres, cubes, or cylinders) in soft shades of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} are placed in the periphery or blurred in the distance to add depth without distracting from the center. The floor has a matte texture that catches soft, directional shadows.
description_en: A minimal 3D rendering style featuring smooth, matte textures reminiscent of soft plastic or refined clay. It utilizes pastel color palettes, diffuse studio lighting, and rounded geometry to create a clean, tactile, and comforting aesthetic.
description_fr: Un style de rendu 3D minimaliste caractérisé par des textures lisses et mates rappelant le plastique doux ou l'argile raffinée. Il utilise des palettes pastel, un éclairage de studio diffus et une géométrie arrondie pour créer une esthétique propre, tactile et réconfortante.

title: Corporate Sketch
description: Ce style se caractérise par une illustration vectorielle minimaliste aux contours noirs façon croquis et aux aplats de couleurs unies sans ombrage. L'esthétique est épurée et professionnelle, utilisant largement l'espace négatif blanc pour une clarté maximale.
prompt: A professional minimalist vector illustration of {{subject}}, designed in a clean corporate art style. The rendering relies on distinct, hand-drawn black ink outlines that are slightly sketchy yet confident, clearly defining forms without rigid geometry. Coloration consists strictly of flat, solid blocks of {{primary_color}} for main elements and {{accent_color}} for highlights, with absolutely no gradients, shadows, or texturing. Large areas of white negative space are integrated into the figures. The composition is isolated against a pure white background, emphasizing simplicity and communication. 2D, flat design, vector graphics, white background, no shading, minimal, corporate art, high contrast, clean lines, editorial illustration.
background_prompt: A minimal, abstract background setting featuring sparse architectural lines and simple geometric forms drawn in a sketchy black outline style. The environment uses flat fills of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} to suggest spatial structure without visual clutter. The design relies heavily on white negative space and complete 2D flatness, creating a clean, professional atmosphere suitable for corporate presentations or editorial layouts.
description_fr: Ce style se caractérise par une illustration vectorielle minimaliste aux contours noirs façon croquis et aux aplats de couleurs unies sans ombrage. L'esthétique est épurée et professionnelle, utilisant largement l'espace négatif blanc pour une clarté maximale.

title: Grainy Risograph
description: Ce style présente une esthétique d'illustration plate charmante imitant la Risographie ou la sérigraphie, caractérisée par des textures à grain épais et un ombrage en pointillés. Il utilise des effets de projecteur à bords nets pour créer un contraste spectaculaire entre les zones éclairées et les ombres de couleur unie, donnant une ambiance rétro et indie chaleureuse.
prompt: A textured, flat-style digital illustration of {{subject}} rendered in the aesthetic of a Risograph print or grainy screen print. The visual style is defined by a distinct, hard-edged spotlight effect: a cone of bright light cuts across the scene, creating a sharp geometric division between the illuminated focal point and the surrounding shadows. The lighting is not soft or diffuse; it creates bold, solid shapes of light and dark. The color palette utilizes {{primary_color}} as the dominant hue within the light, contrasting with deep, muted tones of {{accent_color}} in the shadowed areas. The surface texture is heavily emphasized with a rough paper grain, chalky noise, and stipple shading, avoiding all smooth digital gradients in favor of solid color blocks and speckled dithering. Outlines are simple, slightly imperfect, and hand-drawn, contributing to a cozy, lo-fi, and indie editorial look. The composition is 2D or slight isometric, focusing on shape and texture over realistic perspective. Reinforce the tactile feel of ink on matte construction paper.
description_en: This style features a charming flat illustration aesthetic mimicking Risograph or screen printing, characterized by heavy grain textures and stipple shading. It utilizes distinct hard-edged spotlight effects to create dramatic contrast between lit areas and solid-colored shadows, resulting in a cozy, retro indie-zine vibe.
description_fr: Ce style présente une esthétique d'illustration plate charmante imitant la Risographie ou la sérigraphie, caractérisée par des textures à grain épais et un ombrage en pointillés. Il utilise des effets de projecteur à bords nets pour créer un contraste spectaculaire entre les zones éclairées et les ombres de couleur unie, donnant une ambiance rétro et indie chaleureuse.
background_prompt: A textured background environment featuring abstract geometric shapes, stylized plants, or simple interior elements rendered in a flat Risograph style. A dramatic, hard-edged beam of light creates a diagonal slice across the composition, illuminating a section in bright {{primary_color}} while leaving the rest in a shadowed {{accent_color}}. The texture is heavy with stipple noise and paper grain, with no central subject, serving as a retro, lo-fi backdrop or decorative frame.

title: Spotlight Lineart
prompt: A precise isometric line art illustration of {{subject}}, rendered with fine, consistent ink outlines in {{primary_color}}. The drawing style is technical yet whimsical, set upon a textured, off-white paper surface with visible grain and speckles. A dramatic, semi-transparent conical spotlight beam in {{accent_color}} shines down from above, illuminating a specific circular section of the {{subject}}. Inside this pool of light, the details are filled with solid flat {{accent_color}} tones, creating a focal point, while elements outside the beam remain as clean, unfilled skeletal outlines. The composition is minimalist with ample negative space, composited on a clean {{background_color}} background to ensure sharp edge definition.
background_prompt: A textured vintage paper surface featuring a geometric conical spotlight beam descending from the top center in {{accent_color}}. The beam casts a defined circular pool of flat color on the ground plane, meant to highlight a central element. The surrounding area is composed of negative space with subtle paper grain, faint speckles, and minimal {{primary_color}} texture marks, all set against a {{background_color}} backdrop.

title: Vintage Woodcut
description: Ce style imite les techniques traditionnelles d'impression en relief comme la gravure sur bois ou le linoléum, caractérisé par des lignes audacieuses, des textures rugueuses et une palette de couleurs limitée. Il présente une esthétique nostalgique et lo-fi avec un grain d'encre visible et des effets de pointillés, rappelant les illustrations de vieux livres ou les timbres anciens.
description_en: This style mimics traditional relief printing techniques like woodblock or linocut, characterized by bold lines, rough textures, and a limited color palette. It features a nostalgic, lo-fi aesthetic with visible ink grain and stippling effects, reminiscent of old book illustrations or vintage stamps.
description_fr: Ce style imite les techniques traditionnelles d'impression en relief comme la gravure sur bois ou le linoléum, caractérisé par des lignes audacieuses, des textures rugueuses et une palette de couleurs limitée. Il présente une esthétique nostalgique et lo-fi avec un grain d'encre visible et des effets de pointillés, rappelant les illustrations de vieux livres ou les timbres anciens.
prompt: A highly detailed vintage woodcut or linocut illustration of {{subject}}, rendered in a classic relief printing style. The artwork mimics the aesthetic of an antique book plate, a hand-carved block print, or a retro ink stamp. The visual language relies on bold, expressive ink lines, rough cross-hatching, and stippling textures to create form and volume, completely eschewing smooth digital gradients or photorealistic shading. The color palette is restricted to a striking duotone or tritone scheme, utilizing {{primary_color}} as the dominant heavy ink for the main subject's structure and {{accent_color}} for secondary details, ground elements, or highlights. The texture is intentionally imperfect and tactile, featuring the characteristic noise, grain, and slight ink bleed of a risograph or screen print. The lines have a jagged, organic quality, suggesting the physical resistance of wood or linoleum against a carving tool. The composition focuses on a strong, graphic silhouette, set distinctly against a clean {{background_color}} background to ensure sharp contrast and edge definition. The overall atmosphere is nostalgic, folkloric, and handcrafted, evoking the feeling of 19th-century fantasy illustrations. Reinforcement tags: relief print, etching style, retro illustration, grainy texture, ink stamp aesthetic, high contrast, flat colors, coarse grain, antique, folk art, 2D, vector-like clarity with textured finish, analog aesthetic, rough edges, no 3D render.
background_prompt: A textured vintage woodcut environment featuring rough ground terrain, etched landscape lines, and abstract foliage elements rendered in {{accent_color}} and {{primary_color}} ink. The scene depicts a minimalist setting with stippled shadows and distressed ink textures, resembling the background of an antique map or engraved nature scene. It is designed as a decorative layer with paper grain noise, set against a {{background_color}} surface.

title: Playful 3D
description: Un style de rendu de personnage 3D haut de gamme rappelant les studios d'animation modernes comme Pixar ou Illumination. Il présente des textures mates et douces, un éclairage de studio diffus avec diffusion sous-surface, et une esthétique propre aux dégradés pastel.
description_en: A high-end 3D character rendering style reminiscent of modern feature animation studios like Pixar or Illumination. It features smooth matte textures, soft studio lighting with subsurface scattering, and a clean, pastel gradient aesthetic.
description_fr: Un style de rendu de personnage 3D haut de gamme rappelant les studios d'animation modernes comme Pixar ou Illumination. Il présente des textures mates et douces, un éclairage de studio diffus avec diffusion sous-surface, et une esthétique propre aux dégradés pastel.
prompt: A stunning, high-fidelity 3D character render of {{subject}} visualized in a premium animation style reminiscent of modern Pixar or Disney feature films. The rendering technique utilizes physically based rendering (PBR) with stylized, exaggerated proportions and soft, rounded edges to create a friendly and appealing aesthetic. The surface materials are exquisite, featuring smooth matte clay, soft high-quality cotton fabrics, or pristine vinyl textures in {{primary_color}}, accented by subtle details in {{accent_color}}. Apply heavy subsurface scattering (SSS) to skin or organic surfaces to create a warm, translucent, living glow, particularly around thin areas like ears or extremities. The lighting setup is a professional softbox studio arrangement: a large, diffuse key light provides even illumination, while a gentle rim light separates the subject from the background. The color palette is vibrant yet pastel, avoiding harsh contrasts. The camera uses a portrait lens (85mm equivalent) with a shallow depth of field, keeping the focus sharp on the eyes and face while blurring the edges. 3D render, cgi, cinema4d, octane render, redshift, unreal engine 5, 8k resolution, raytracing, global illumination, ambient occlusion, cartoon realism, cute, expressive, volumetric light, smooth shading, masterpiece, digital art.
background_prompt: A clean, soft-focus studio backdrop featuring a smooth gradient transition. The background blends pastel tones of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} into a creamy, neutral horizon. Minimalist and atmospheric, with a subtle vignette and soft ambient occlusion shadows to suggest a curved infinity wall or seamless paper background. No distinct objects, just pure color and light.

title: Bauhaus Geometry
description: Ce style présente une esthétique minimaliste et plate inspirée des mouvements Bauhaus et Constructiviste, caractérisée par la réduction de sujets complexes en formes géométriques fondamentales comme des cercles, des triangles et des rectangles. Il utilise une palette de couleurs audacieuse et limitée avec des blocs de couleur unis, des bords nets et une absence de dégradés ou d'ombrages, souvent recouverts d'une subtile texture de papier vintage.
description_en: This style features a minimalist, flat aesthetic inspired by the Bauhaus and Constructivist movements, characterized by reducing complex subjects into fundamental geometric shapes like circles, triangles, and rectangles. It utilizes a bold, limited color palette with solid blocks of color, sharp edges, and a lack of gradients or shading, often overlaid with a subtle vintage paper texture.
description_fr: Ce style présente une esthétique minimaliste et plate inspirée des mouvements Bauhaus et Constructiviste, caractérisée par la réduction de sujets complexes en formes géométriques fondamentales comme des cercles, des triangles et des rectangles. Il utilise une palette de couleurs audacieuse et limitée avec des blocs de couleur unis, des bords nets et une absence de dégradés ou d'ombrages, souvent recouverts d'une subtile texture de papier vintage.
prompt: A highly stylized, flat geometric illustration of {{subject}} rendered in the distinct artistic style of Bauhaus and Constructivism. The subject is completely deconstructed into fundamental primitive shapes—perfect solid circles, sharp triangles, and bold rectangles—arranged to form a recognizable but abstract silhouette. There are absolutely no gradients, shadows, drop shadows, or 3D depth; the rendering is strictly 2D and flat. The visual language relies on pure mathematical form and structural balance. The color palette is striking and high-contrast, utilizing dominant blocks of {{primary_color}} and vibrant highlights of {{accent_color}}, anchored by heavy black structural forms and stark lines. The artwork is composited on a clean {{background_color}} surface, simulating the look of a vintage modernist poster or screen print on high-quality matte paper. The edges are razor-sharp and precise. The composition is asymmetrical yet harmonious, emphasizing order, clarity, and functional design. A very subtle, uniform noise-like grain texture is applied overall to give it a tangible, printed feel, avoiding a digital plastic look. The aesthetic is intellectual, modern, and graphic.
background_prompt: An abstract geometric pattern consisting of floating primitive shapes and architectural lines. Large and small blocks of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} arranged in a grid-based but asymmetrical composition against a {{background_color}} background. The style is flat, minimalist, and structural, reminiscent of a modernist art gallery wall or a vintage Bauhaus textile design, with a subtle matte paper texture and no depth or shading.

title: Felted Whimsy
description: Ce style imite la texture tactile et duveteuse des sculptures en laine cardée (feutrage à l'aiguille) capturées par la macrophotographie. Il présente des palettes de couleurs pastel douces, des formes arrondies adorables et une profondeur de champ extrêmement faible qui met en valeur les détails fibreux du matériau tout en floutant l'arrière-plan dans une douceur onirique.
description_en: This style imitates the tactile, fuzzy texture of handcrafted needle-felted wool sculptures captured through macro photography. It features soft pastel color palettes, adorable rounded shapes, and an extremely shallow depth of field that emphasizes the fibrous material details while blurring the background into a dreamy softness.
description_fr: Ce style imite la texture tactile et duveteuse des sculptures en laine cardée (feutrage à l'aiguille) capturées par la macrophotographie. Il présente des palettes de couleurs pastel douces, des formes arrondies adorables et une profondeur de champ extrêmement faible qui met en valeur les détails fibreux du matériau tout en floutant l'arrière-plan dans une douceur onirique.
prompt: A hyper-realistic macro photograph of a handcrafted needle-felted wool masterpiece featuring {{subject}}. The image captures the exquisite tactile nature of the medium, showcasing visible stray wool fibers, matted textures, and the soft, fuzzy surface of the felted material. The {{subject}} is rendered with rounded, simplified forms and a charming, innocent aesthetic reminiscent of high-quality stop-motion animation puppets or artisanal soft sculptures. The color palette is dominated by gentle hues of {{primary_color}}, creating a soothing and airy base, while details in {{accent_color}} add warmth and visual interest without breaking the softness. The lighting is high-key, bright, and diffuse, mimicking a softbox studio setup that eliminates harsh shadows and bathes the scene in a gentle glow. The composition employs a tilt-shift lens effect with an extremely shallow depth of field, keeping the main subject in razor-sharp focus to highlight the fabric grain, while the foreground and background dissolve into a creamy, heavy bokeh blur. The atmosphere is cozy, whimsical, and heartwarming, evoking the feeling of a miniature handmade world. no perspective, sharp focus on texture, cinematic lighting, 8k, ultra detailed, volumetric light, soft shadows, photorealistic, craftcore, fibrous texture, wool grain, miniature photography, diorama style.
background_prompt: A blurred, soft-focus environment resembling a miniature landscape made entirely of needle-felted wool. Rolling hills and abstract organic shapes crafted from fuzzy, matted fibers in shades of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} create a plush, dreamlike setting. The texture is visibly fibrous and soft, with stray wool hairs catching the light. Large, rounded forms suggest soft clouds or vegetation in the distance, rendered with heavy bokeh and tilt-shift blur to create a sense of tiny scale. The lighting is bright, airy, and cheerful, perfect for a backdrop behind a miniature subject or a fuzzy foreground frame.

title: Soft Vector
description: Ce style présente une esthétique vectorielle plate et épurée avec une palette pastel douce et sophistiquée ainsi qu'une composition géométrique précise. Il se caractérise par des surfaces mates lisses, des formes sans contours et des ombres angulaires distinctes suggérant une lumière naturelle douce et directionnelle, évoquant une ambiance éditoriale moderne et sereine.
description_en: This style features a clean, flat vector aesthetic with a sophisticated muted pastel palette and precise geometric composition. It is characterized by smooth matte surfaces, lineless forms, and distinct angular shadows that suggest soft, directional natural light, evoking a modern and serene editorial mood.
description_fr: Ce style présente une esthétique vectorielle plate et épurée avec une palette pastel douce et sophistiquée ainsi qu'une composition géométrique précise. Il se caractérise par des surfaces mates lisses, des formes sans contours et des ombres angulaires distinctes suggérant une lumière naturelle douce et directionnelle, évoquant une ambiance éditoriale moderne et sereine.
prompt: A high-quality, flat vector illustration of {{subject}}, rendered in a sophisticated modern editorial style commonly seen in premium tech branding. The artwork features a clean, 2D aesthetic with no black outlines (lineless art). The composition is geometric and balanced, utilizing smooth curves and sharp angles to define forms. The color palette is soft, muted, and low-contrast, dominated by shades of {{primary_color}} with subtle highlights in cream and off-white, and strategic details in {{accent_color}}. The lighting is a defining feature: simulate soft, warm morning sunlight streaming from a side window, casting distinct, sharp-edged diagonal shadows (hard shadows) and shafts of light across the scene, adding depth to the flat layers. Textures are minimal and matte; surfaces look smooth like vector shapes, with subtle patterns used sparingly to suggest material (e.g., knits or wood grain) without visual noise. The characters, if present, are stylized with simplified or faceless features. The overall atmosphere is calm, organized, and serene, focusing on a 'slow living' or 'mindful' aesthetic. No gradients, solid flat colors, precise vector paths.
background_prompt: A serene, minimalist architectural environment rendered in a flat vector style. The scene consists of clean geometric planes and smooth matte surfaces dominated by {{primary_color}} and soft neutral creams. Diagonal shafts of light stream across the background, creating sharp, angular semi-transparent shadows that add depth to the 2D composition. Subtle interior elements or abstract geometric shapes in {{accent_color}} provide balance. The texture is perfectly smooth and digital, with no noise or grain, evoking a quiet, sunlit modern space.

title: Textured Riso
description: Un style d'illustration contemporain audacieux qui mélange des formes vectorielles géométriques plates avec des textures de pinceau sec et un grain risographique. Il présente une palette de couleurs limitée et très contrastée avec des formes abstraites et des détails griffonnés sur un fond couleur crème.
description_en: A bold contemporary illustration style that blends flat geometric vector shapes with rough, dry-brush textures and risograph grain. It features a limited, high-contrast color palette with abstract forms and squiggly details on a cream-colored background.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration contemporain audacieux qui mélange des formes vectorielles géométriques plates avec des textures de pinceau sec et un grain risographique. Il présente une palette de couleurs limitée et très contrastée avec des formes abstraites et des détails griffonnés sur un fond couleur crème.
prompt: A striking, avant-garde editorial illustration of {{subject}} rendered in a textured risograph and screen-print style. The artwork is defined by a mix of flat, geometric abstraction and organic, rough-edged textures. The subject is constructed using bold blocks of solid color rather than realistic shading, utilizing a limited palette where {{primary_color}} dominates the main forms and {{accent_color}} provides vibrant, contrasting highlights. The rendering mimics the look of dry pastel or chalk on paper, with jagged, dry-brush edges on black silhouettes and thick, squiggly lines adding playful details. There are no smooth gradients; instead, depth is suggested through hard-edged color separation and overlapping shapes. The texture is grainy and noisy, resembling a high-quality analogue print on matte surface. The background is a solid, warm off-white or cream color that maximizes the contrast of the bold figures. The overall aesthetic is minimalist yet expressive, combining elements of cubism with modern graphic design. artistic, flat design, screen print aesthetic, chalk texture, noise overlay, abstract features, bold graphic lines, high contrast, 8k resolution, vector style with texture.
background_prompt: A minimalist abstract composition featuring rough, dry-brush textures and geometric shapes on a cream-colored paper background. The scene uses bold blocks of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} arranged in a flat, screen-print style. Scattered black squiggly lines and chalky textures create a decorative frame. High-contrast risograph grain, artistic noise, negative space, avant-garde pattern, matte finish.

title: Ghibli Nostalgia
description: Ce style capture l'esthétique emblématique et chaleureuse des animations du Studio Ghibli, avec des arrière-plans luxuriants peints à la main et des sujets aux contours nets (cel-shading). Il met l'accent sur l'éclairage naturel, la lumière du soleil tachetée (komorebi) et une palette de couleurs riche et organique qui évoque un sentiment d'émerveillement et de mélancolie paisible.
description_en: This style captures the iconic, heartwarming aesthetic of Studio Ghibli animations, featuring lush, hand-painted backgrounds and clean, cel-shaded subjects. It emphasizes natural lighting, dappled sunlight (komorebi), and a rich, organic color palette that evokes a sense of wonder and peaceful melancholy.
description_fr: Ce style capture l'esthétique emblématique et chaleureuse des animations du Studio Ghibli, avec des arrière-plans luxuriants peints à la main et des sujets aux contours nets (cel-shading). Il met l'accent sur l'éclairage naturel, la lumière du soleil tachetée (komorebi) et une palette de couleurs riche et organique qui évoque un sentiment d'émerveillement et de mélancolie paisible.
prompt: A breathtaking, high-fidelity anime production still in the legendary style of Studio Ghibli and Hayao Miyazaki, featuring {{subject}}. The artistic rendering combines crisp, traditional 2D cel-shading for the {{subject}} with clean outlines and flat colors, set against a stunningly detailed, hand-painted background reminiscent of Kazuo Oga's art. The environment is rendered with the texture of opaque watercolors and poster paint, emphasizing organic imperfections, mossy surfaces, and weathered textures. The color grading is naturalistic yet vibrant, dominated by lush {{primary_color}} tones that establish the atmospheric mood, while the {{subject}} features distinct pops of {{accent_color}} to create visual interest. The lighting is soft, diffuse, and magical, characterized by 'komorebi'—dappled sunlight filtering through dense foliage—casting gentle, shifting shadows and volumetric light rays. The composition creates a sense of scale and immersion. The overall atmosphere is nostalgic, serene, and deeply emotional, capturing the Japanese concept of 'mono no aware'. Reinforcement tags: masterpiece, best quality, 1990s anime aesthetic, hand drawn, highly detailed, 8k resolution, cinematic composition, soft focus background, sharp focus subject, lush vegetation, atmospheric perspective, idyllic, whimsical.
background_prompt: A serene, hand-painted anime landscape background without any characters, executed in the style of a high-budget animated feature film. The scene depicts a lush, detailed environment painted with poster colors and watercolors, featuring ancient trees, moss-covered stones, or a quiet country road. The palette is rich in {{primary_color}} hues representing the natural world, with subtle highlights of {{accent_color}} in wildflowers or light reflections. Dappled sunlight filters through the canopy, creating soft patches of light and shadow on the ground. The texture is painterly yet realistic, capturing the nostalgic and peaceful essence of a summer day in the countryside.
